metadata.title: CVE-2023-0049 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Out-of-bounds Read in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1143.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0049` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-athena - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-gnome - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-gtk - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-gui-common - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-nox - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-runtime - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
vim-tiny - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
xxd - 2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.0.1453-1ubuntu1.11').
